trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Worcester
There were no other sightings in Worcester on or around February 29th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dog when I looked up at the sky. I noticed something going by and at first I thought that it was a plane. Then it changed course and started looping around. I just stood there, gazing up at it. After about 2 minutes of aerial maneuvers it stopped and sped off into the distance.
Summary: It had one bright white light and a bilnking red one.
